name: Chronotron
description:
It’s about a robot that goes back in time for some reason. (His best friend is a talking pie!)

Use your time machine to interact with past versions of yourself in this puzzle/platformer!

You can disable the music in the options menu, or by right-clicking.

IF YOU CAN’T SAVE: Right click on the game, select “settings”. Click on the folder, and slide the bar to the right. Flash has a limit to how much data you can store per site, and you guys have been playing too many games on Kong! =P
